channel.description: Recent content in rendering on Harsh's Blog

item.title: Problems with rendering pdf.js in Web Worker
item.description: I was tinkering with pdf.js and pdf-lib. I was trying to see what open source free technologies can do. Then I thought of how efficient it would be to move the main computation of working with pdf-lib and pdf.js to a web worker. I did a small test. I created a small html file that places a select file input control on the UI and a div to hold images.
